document.full_text: florida state prosecutors will seek the death penalty for a miami-dade county couple charged with torturing and killing their 10-year-old adopted daughter and abusing her twin brother, a spokesman said on monday.
document.title: miami couple to face death penalty in child murder case
lines_and_colors: florida state prosecutors will seek the death penalty for a miami-dade county couple charged with torturing and killing their 10-year-old adopted daughter and abusing her twin brother, a spokesman said on monday.
